summary: The implementation covers most core requirements including backend data models, filtering, category support, dashboard UI, and user profiles. However, several critical features are missing: the complete Opportunity Score algorithm implementation, keyword research backend integration, trend detection system, profit calculator, competitor analysis backend, alert system backend logic, and monetization tier enforcement. Some advanced features like AI-generated suggestions and private label scoring are also not implemented.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement proprietary Opportunity Score algorithm with all four factors (Demand Score, Competition Score, Growth Score, Margin Potential) and their specific calculation criteria
missing_requirements.reason: Backend only includes placeholder types for OpportunityScore but does not implement the complete algorithm with BSR-based demand scoring, review velocity tracking, sponsored listing density analysis, or trending keyword detection

missing_requirements.requirement: Build keyword research module with backend support for search volume estimates, keyword difficulty scoring, CPC estimates, and 12-month trend data storage
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend component exists with mock data but backend has no KeywordResearch type implementation or query functions to retrieve actual keyword metrics

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement trend detection system backend logic that analyzes review growth spikes, price trends, seasonal patterns, and automatically assigns Rising Star badges
missing_requirements.reason: TrendDetection type exists but no backend functions implement the actual analysis algorithms or badge assignment logic

missing_requirements.requirement: Create India-specific profit calculator with backend functions computing all cost factors (referral fees, FBA fees, GST, shipping, packaging, ads) and outputs
missing_requirements.reason: ProfitCalculator type defined but no backend query/update functions implement the actual calculations with India-specific GST rates and fee structures

missing_requirements.requirement: Build competitor analysis backend system storing top 10 sellers per product with metrics and weakness detection algorithms
missing_requirements.reason: SellerAnalysis type exists but no backend data storage or query functions for competitor data per product; frontend page exists but cannot retrieve real data

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement seller alerts notification system backend that monitors four trigger conditions and stores alert history
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend displays mock alerts but backend has no alert monitoring logic, trigger detection algorithms, or alert storage/retrieval functions

missing_requirements.requirement: Enforce monetization tier system with daily search limits for Free tier and feature restrictions
missing_requirements.reason: SubscriptionTier enum exists in backend but no enforcement logic for daily search limits, CSV export restrictions, or saved list limits based on tier

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement CSV export functionality for paid tiers
missing_requirements.reason: No CSV export functions or data serialization logic found in backend or frontend code

missing_requirements.requirement: Add AI-generated opportunity explanations for each product
missing_requirements.reason: No AI suggestion generation logic or text field storage for explanations found in Product type or backend functions

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement private label suitability score calculation
missing_requirements.reason: No private label scoring algorithm or score field in backend data model

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement brand domination detection and market saturation warnings
missing_requirements.reason: No backend logic to analyze brand dominance or calculate market saturation metrics

missing_requirements.requirement: Calculate estimated capital required for each product opportunity
missing_requirements.reason: No capital requirement calculation function or field in product data model

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide India sourcing suggestions with local manufacturer hints
missing_requirements.reason: No sourcing suggestion data or logic found in backend

hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not mention caffeine.ai branding or attribution requirements in any section including images, requirements, or constraints
